data.name: Case
data.value: case

data.name: Cases
data.value: cases

data.name: Are
data.value: are

data.name: Is
data.value: is

data.name: SwitchAllCasesNotHandledTitle
data.value: All possible cases not handled.

data.name: SwitchAllCasesNotHandledDescription
data.value: Switch should handle cases of all possible types.

data.name: SwitchAllCasesNotHandledMessageFormat
data.value: {0} {1} in '{2}' {3} not handled.

data.name: UnionsCannotBeExtendedOutsideTheirAssemblyTitle
data.value: Unions extensions must be declared in the same assembly as their union.

data.name: UnionsCannotBeExtendedOutsideTheirAssemblyDescription
data.value: A union and its extensions must be declared in the same assembly, so that all cases are known at compile time.

data.name: UnionsCannotBeExtendedOutsideTheirAssemblyMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' must be declared in assembly '{1}'.

data.name: CasesShouldBeSealedTitle
data.value: All cases should be sealed.

data.name: CasesShouldBeSealedDescription
data.value: Cases should be sealed so that all cases are known at compile time.

data.name: CasesShouldBeSealedMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' case is not sealed.

data.name: SwitchShouldNotHaveDefaultCaseTitle
data.value: Default case should not be handled.

data.name: SwitchShouldNotHaveDefaultCaseDescription
data.value: A switch on a union should not handle the default case.

data.name: SwitchShouldNotHaveDefaultCaseMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' is a union and should not handle the default case.

data.name: SwitchHasUnreachableNullCaseTitle
data.value: Null case should not be handled.

data.name: SwitchHasUnreachableNullCaseDescription
data.value: Switches on non nullable types should not handle the null case.

data.name: SwitchHasUnreachableNullCaseMessageFormat
data.value: The null case is unreachable and should not be handled.

data.name: ClassDiscriminatedUnionsMustBeAbstractDescription
data.value: A union declared for a class/record class must be abstract.

data.name: ClassUnionsMustBeAbstractTitle
data.value: Class-based union must be abstract.

data.name: ClassUnionsMustBeAbstractMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' union is not abstract.

data.name: OnlyUnionsCanExtendOtherUnionsDescription
data.value: Only unions can extend other unions, so that all cases are known at compile time..

data.name: OnlyUnionsCanExtendOtherUnionsTitle
data.value: Only unions can extend other unions.

data.name: OnlyUnionsCanExtendOtherUnionsMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' is not marked with union attribute.

data.name: CasesMustBeDeclaredInUnionAssemblyDescription
data.value: A union and its cases must be declared in the same assembly, so that all cases are known at compile time.

data.name: CasesMustBeDeclaredInUnionAssemblyTitle
data.value: Cases must be declared in the same assembly as their unions

data.name: CasesMustBeDeclaredInUnionAssemblyMessageFormat
data.value: {0} must be declared in assembly {1}.

data.name: UnnestedCasesShouldHaveFactoryMethodDescription
data.value: Discriminated unions with unnested cases should declare factory methods.

data.name: UnnestedCasesShouldHaveFactoryMethodTitle
data.value: Unnested cases should have factory method.

data.name: UnnestedCasesShouldHaveFactoryMethodMessageFormat
data.value: Case '{0}' should have factory method in '{1}'. Navigate to '{1}' and execute code fix PDU0001 to fix.

data.name: PopulateFactoryMethodsDescription
data.value: Populates factory methods for all cases in the union.

data.name: PopulateFactoryMethodsTitle
data.value: Populate factory methods.

data.name: PopulateFactoryMethodsMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' should have factory methods for all cases.

data.name: SwitchShouldThrowInDefaultCaseTitle
data.value: Default case should throw UnreachableCaseException.

data.name: SwitchShouldThrowInDefaultCaseDescription
data.value: A switch on a union should throw UnreachableCaseException in default case.

data.name: SwitchShouldThrowInDefaultCaseMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' is a union and should throw UnreachableCaseException in default case.

data.name: SuppressCS8509Justification
data.value: Switch over a union, which is checked for exhaustiveness by another analyzer.

data.name: FactoryMethodShouldHaveMatchingCaseTypeAttributeDescription
data.value: Factory method must have CaseTypeAttribute specifying the created case type to support unions in referenced libraries.

data.name: FactoryMethodShouldHaveMatchingCaseTypeAttributeMessageFormat
data.value: Factory method '{0}' did not specify '{1}' in a CaseTypeAttribute.

data.name: FactoryMethodShouldHaveMatchingCaseTypeAttributeTitle
data.value: Factory method must have CaseTypeAttribute.

data.name: MakePartialDescription
data.value: Makes the union/case partial for the code generator can create factory methods.

data.name: MakePartialMessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' should be partial to enable the code generator.

data.name: MakePartialTitle
data.value: Make union or case partial.

data.name: CaseShouldBeImplementedDescription
data.value: Reported when a case is implemented by throwing NotImplementedException, because CodeCleanup may siliently 'fix' SDU0001.

data.name: CaseShouldBeImplementedMessageFormat
data.value: Case '{0}' is not implemented

data.name: CaseShouldBeImplementedTitle
data.value: Case is implemented by throwing NotImplementedException.

data.name: CasesCannotContainTypeParametersWhichAreNotInTheUnionTitle
data.value: Cases cannot contain type parameters which are not in the union.

data.name: CasesCannotContainTypeParametersWhichAreNotInTheUnionDescription
data.value: Additional type parameters in a case, would break exhaustive checking that all cases are handled.

data.name: CasesCannotContainTypeParametersWhichAreNotInTheUnionMessageFormat
data.value: The case '{0}' contains the type parameter '{1}' which is not present in the union type '{2}'.
